body.name: Facón Transparent Non-Foaming Clear Shave Gel with Skin Soothing Aloe Vera, Cooling Menthol Peppermint Oil, Sandalwood Oil Scent - Extra Glide for an Ultra-Clean Smooth Shave (10 fl oz / 296 ml)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 17 mins
features: SIGNATURE CLEAR GEL - Unlike shaving foam, clear gel has maximum visibility for a precise smooth crisp shave
PREMIUM INGREDIENTS - Aloe Vera skin hydration, Peppermint Oil cooling sensation, Sandalwood Oil luxury scent
ELITE SHAVE - Extra glide and lubrication for an ultra-clean smooth beard edging and shaving experience
CONVENIENCE - Easy squeeze bottle for comfortable gel dispensing - no clog, no mess, no waste
LIFETIME GUARANTEE - Standard lifetime return guarantee, no questions asked. Try it risk-free today!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: #1 FACT: SHAVE FOAM DOESN'T WORK This, on the other hand, ladies & gentlemen, is THE original Facón Clear Shave Gel. Mightily formulated from Aloe Vera extract for skin hydration and Peppermint oil for cooling sensation to provide you a crisp clean smooth shave. With its Sandalwood oil scent and extra glide lubrication, you will enjoy the ultra-clean beard edging and smooth shaving experience. Plus its packaged in easy squeeze 10 fl oz bottle for comfortable gel dispensing - no clog, no mess, no waste. Say goodbye to shave foam! #2 FACT: SHE CAN TELL THE DIFFERENCE Agreed! The Legendary Facón Straight Razor gives you a Pure Raw Classic shaving experience regardless of how long you've been in this game. Pop your favorite blade in and enjoy a smooth and close shave that's almost impossible to achieve with conventional cartridge razors or electric shavers. It's meant for folks who want to make a statement. That's why straight razors are preferred choice of barbers, salons and hair/beard enthusiasts. And SHE will thank you for it! #3 FACT: I'M SEXY AND I KNOW IT Sure if you say so! But I am thrilled to share the secret. I obviously shave with Facón Clear Shave Gel. It helps my beard, mustache and hairline looking fresh as if I just came from the barbershop. Plus I love to support small businesses. Mom and Pop shop working tirelessly to produce premium quality products and make sure all their customers are 100% satisfied while giving back to the local community. Isn't that awesome? Yup! Welcome to Pure Raw Crisp Clean Classic shaving experience!

THE HIGHLIGHTS Clear gel for maximum visibilityAloe Vera extract for skin hydrationPeppermint Oil for cooling sensationSandalwood Oil nostalgic luxury scentExtra glide and lubrication for an ultra-clean shaveEasy squeeze bottle for comfortable gel dispensing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: A must-go product for individuals looking for sulfate and paraben free shave gel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Closest and softest shave
reviews.reviewText: I own a barbershop and I purchased this product because it was recommended by a barber friend of mine. I love this more than any shave soap!The shave is closer than with shave soap and I am better able to get a close head shave!I also will use it to moisturize dry scalps after a haircut if they need it. I will also use it as a soft hair gel.The men love it and do say they notice a difference in the shave!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it, but it could be better
reviews.reviewText: I honestly don't know how I feel about this product, used it 4 times now, on my side burns it works great 0 complaint. However when I use it to shave my head it's been inconsistent, it works and isn't bad but it almost clogs my razor so I have to rinse it off very frequently. I've shaved my head for 5 years, I've used many products and this isn't something I normally have to do on a single stroke.As the product states it's non-foaming, it's a gel, and for my head I feel I have to use an unreasonable amount as this isn't exactly concentrated. Any amount of moisture will instantly water it down causing it to lose a good bit of slickness. I feel I have to apply it heavily just to shave my head, which will not be a problem for most people I would assume.I don't know exactly how to put it in words but with applied thing it's not that great, its intended to use as is, you really can't apply a thin layer and expect it to work well. The gel does not like moisture, really any amount of moisture will cause the gel to evaporate and turn into water and run off my head (and occasionally in my eyes). I do shave my head in the shower though, so maybe if I did it outside of the shower this wouldn't be an issue.I just wish the gel didn't turn to water due to moisture in the shower, or me sweating because of the moisture. I do like the scent though, very pleasant, and it leaves a nice feel on my skin, just feels soft and moisturized I really enjoy that about the product. I've never used a product like this, I bought it at random when it had no reviews so I just figured I would try it.Overall I like it I just wish the product handled water better, a lot of people do shave in the shower, moisture is unavoidable for many. I also wish it was more slick when applied thin, but overall I do like it but if these few things didn't happen I would use it daily without complaint. I think anyone who just shaves there face outside of the shower wouldn't really deal with these issues and would probably really enjoy it as its worked very well for my side burns and trimming my beard lines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like using This when I’m tryna shave up I like the smell of it when you put it on your face and different parts of your face to . It’s not bad it’s real smooth when you put it on your face and it will stick to it right when you remove the r hair off your face and neck on your body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works but not the best
reviews.reviewText: Overall the scent is great and last a while but drys up before making it all the way around your face. While it is wet is shaved easily just with it didn’t dry up so quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to try a different way to shave and when I saw this bundle I couldn’t refuse it was value for my money and I’m already broke lmao but the gel smells like a professional barber shop and there are tons of blade (100) swapping out blades is very easy and very good quality as well even cut myself a few times! Handle with care and I recommend this very much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It not only works as advertised but it smells terrific too.
